creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: boy at L, holding switch in one hand, tugs on rope attached to ox's nose, at R; ox looking towards boy but does not appear to be moving; standing on embankment
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seal:

ULC: [ 近日官租重（？）（?）牛不肥ね童思軟草（？）欲別村乙　] (The recent tax is so heavy; that the people and bulls never get fat; the herd-boy longs for soft (nourishing) grass; and wants to drag the bull to another village.)
signed: ULC: [Gyo-an dai] (By hut of a fisherman)
title: Boy and Ox
